content: ***about this pattern*** crochet your own durable friendship shawl using this crochet pattern in pdf format the finished dimensions are 84cm / 33 height and 180cm / 70 width when lying flat this pattern contains explained written instructions in us crochet terminology the printable pdf is written in english and has a total of 5 pages including the cover page available as an instant download --- ***questions & returns*** there are no returns on digital files please contact me if you have questions about the pattern --- ***please note *** please note that this is an ad-free and special formatted pdf version of my free crochet pattern that can be found on my blog by purchasing this pattern you support me in making more free patterns you can find the free version here https //wilmade com/durable-friendship-shawl ***find me on social media*** patterns https //wilmade com instagram https //instagram com/wilmawestenberg facebook https //www facebook com/bywilmade/ pinterest https //pinterest com/wilmawestenberg
